PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-04852024-05-08PMO
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of HONOURABLE LISE MAISONNEUVE of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a special adviser to the Minister of Sport and Physical Activity, to be known as Commissioner, to hold office during pleasure for a term of eighteen months, on a full-time basis, effective May 9, 2024.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Appointment of HONOURABLE LISE MAISONNEUVE of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a special adviser to the Minister of Sport and Physical Activity, to be known as Commissioner, to hold office during pleasure for a term of eighteen months, on a full-time basis, effective May 9, 2024.
